channel.title: Julian Schnabel on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Julian Schnabel on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘In the Hand of Dante’ Review: Oscar Isaac, Gal Gadot and Gerard Butler Star in Julian Schnabel’s Bonkers, Wildly Uneven Literary Adaptation
item.description: Premiering out of competition at Venice, the film — based on Nick Tosches’ 2002 novel revolving around Dante’s ‘Divine Comedy’ — also features Jason Momoa, Al Pacino and Martin Scorsese.

item.title: Filmmaker Julian Schnabel Defends Gal Gadot in Venice: “There’s No Need to Boycott Artists”
item.description: The veteran auteur, in Venice to world premiere ’In the Hand of Dante,’ also opened up on his influences for a film that stars Oscar Isaac, Gerard Butler, Al Pacino, John Malkovich and Martin Scorsese

item.title: Julian Schnabel Rejects Gaza Activists’ Call for Venice to Disinvite Gal Gadot and Gerard Butler From ‘In the Hand of Dante’ Premiere Over Israel Support
item.description: Julian Schnabel has responded to calls from Gaza activists for Gal Gadot and Gerard Butler, two of the stars of his new film “In the Hand of Dante,” to be disinvited from Venice Film Festi

item.title: Julian Schnabel to Receive Venice Festival’s Cartier Glory to the Filmmaker Award
item.description: The acclaimed artist and filmmaker will screen his new feature, ‘In the Hand of Dante’ out of competition in Venice.
